name: Greg
text: You made it through the door, huh? This is where things start to get real. Up ahead, there's a platform patrolled by a cyborg.

name: Greg
text: Trust me, you don't want to be on the receiving end of its blows—they pack a real punch.

name: Greg
text: If you find yourself with no other choice, remember this — 'right-click' to unleash your plasma cannon.

name: Greg
text: It's not something you want to use lightly, but it can save your skin in a tight spot.

name: You
text: Thanks, Greg. I'll keep that in mind.

name: Greg
text: Ok, buddy! See ya in a bit!
